Related Character(s): 縶
Связанный символ (и): 縶

馽字的基本解释

馽
zhí
古同“絷”：“连之以羁馽。”

馽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》陟立切，入緝，知。］
亦作“1”。
(1)拴缚马足的绳索；绊子。
(2)拴缚牛马等的足。
(3)束缚。

馽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　馽； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1435第06
【唐韻】陟立切，音執。【說文】絆馬足也。【玉篇】絆也。【韓愈·祭柳宗元文】天脫馽羈。　又【韻會】或作縶。【詩·小雅】縶之維之。【疏】在腹曰鞅，在後曰絆。絆，繫足也。縶之謂絆，維之謂繫。【正字通】說文，縶馽本一字重文，从糸執聲，作縶。今經傳皆从縶，字彙引正譌以俗作縶爲非，迂泥。　又【集韻】食律切，音術。【莊子·馬蹄篇】連之以羈馽。【陸德明·音義】馽，丁邑反，徐丁力反，絆也，李音述。　又【集韻】德合切，音答。義同。　【集韻】作?。【字彙】作?。?非。

馽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
馽字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guang Yun" Zhi cut, entered the arrest, know. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) A rope that binds a horse's foot; a stumbling block.
(2) Tie the feet of cattle, horses, etc.
(3) Restraint.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　馽; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1435 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Zhi cuts straight, holds sound. [Said the text] It's also stumbling. [Jade articles] Trip too. 【Han Yu·Ji Liu Zong Yuan Wen】Tian got out of shackles.　[Rhyme Club] or ZuoYi. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The dimension of Yi. 【Sparse】Martingale in the abdomen, and stumbling in the back. Stumble, tie your feet. Ji is called stumbling, and dimension is related. [Zhengzitong] Speaking of text, the text is emphasized in the original text, and the sound is from the 絸 to make the 絷. Today's Scriptures are all from 絷, and the word collection Zhengzhen uses the vulgar to make the 絷 for the wrong, round the mud.　[Jiyun] Food rhythm cutting, sound technique. 【Zhuangzi·Horseshoes】Lian's yoke. 【Lu Deming·Yinyi】Feng, Ding Yifan, Xu Dinglifan, Zheye, Li Yinshu.　[Jiyun] De-comprehensive, sound answer. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】make?. [Vocabulary] For?. ?non.
